channel.title: osint on Andrea Dainese
channel.description: Recent content in osint on Andrea Dainese

item.title: Automating Google searches
item.description: I usually don’t write about OSINT techniques, I think that before approaching OSINT we should speak about ethics and respect. By the way, some OSINT automation techniques are harmless: if you don’t know what you have to search for, you won’t be able to get anything regardless you are automating or not.

item.title: Find and recover deleted files on Git repository
item.description: Git repositories are very interesting from an OSInt perspective. There are a few commands to find out deleted files and recover them in seconds: # Find deleted files git log --diff-filter D --pretty="format:" --name-only | sed '/^$/d' > deleted_files.
